grimdawn-v0.1.5.description:
What's New:

- Skill Balance Randomizer
- Settings to customize the range of skill randomization or block certain attributes from being randomized
- QoL settings such as starting at level 2 and making skill reallocating free

Bug Fixes:

- Fixed Ruins of Abyd interaction site from preventing completion of Soleal faction quest
- Fixed activating bysmiel temple altar before starting the quest permanently softlocking the dlc



Get the poptracker at [https://github.com/routhken/Grim_Dawn_tracker/releases/](https://github.com/routhken/Grim_Dawn_tracker/releases/)
grimdawn-v0.1.5.title: Grim Dawn v0.1.5

v0.2.0.description:
What's New:

- Devotion Skill Randomizer
- Enemy Randomizer and the option to only allow "dangerous" enemies
- Two new goal options: All Bosses and Emblem Hunt
- Item groups for major and minor progression
- Custom deathlink messages
- Option to convert all major progression items into generic progression items for each campaign (main, ashes of malmouth, and forgotton gods). Enabling this means you always get your progress in order, instead of possibly getting unlucky and receiving your progressive items in reverse order
- Added more rare crafting materials to the item pool
- Added slith necklaces as a logical item for the Good Old Slith Charm quest (so enemy rando doesn't rng you from completing it)
- Added Dynamite to the item pool
- Added Inventory Bag to the item pool
- Added a Ashes of Malmouth dlc option
- Lancel the Knight in Devil's Crossing now says what your goal is

What's Changed:

- Rebalanced the ratio of extra exp, skill points, and filler
- Extra exp instead of granting about 10% of a bar at all levels, now grants about 5% past level 15, and significantly higher at very early levels
- Renamed "Skill points +4" to "Skill Points" and they now give 2 skill points
- Renamed "Bloodsworn" to "The Bloodsworn Damned"
- Devotion shrines can all spawn on any difficulty, enabling elite and ultimate runs for greater challenge

Bug Fixes:

- Updated the mod files to the latest patch for Grim Dawn
- Fixed a backwards compatibility issue
- Fixed several typos including Forgotten Gods "Stroy" and "Hundering" Darkness
- Fixed Kymon/Vigil quest 6 being in logic without access to east marsh
- Fixed faction revered items not giving you standing unless you already had a bit standing
- Fixed locations added by FG dlc to the main campaign being enabled when FG was disabled
- Made the patching process asynchronous so it doesn't timeout keepalive pings on potato PCs

Get the poptracker at https://github.com/routhken/Grim_Dawn_tracker/releases/
Get the mod at https://www.nexusmods.com/grimdawn/mods/167
v0.2.0.title: Grim Dawn v0.2.0

v0.3.0.description:
### **What's New:**

- Skill Shuffler
- 4 Traps: camera shake, phantom, dangerous enemy, and slowness
- Setting to buff or nerf enemies

### **What's Changed:**

- Connecting to a multiworld now happens on world load instead of needing to talk to Jarvis
- Improved responsiveness of triggering goal when reaching aetherial emblem requirement
- Client looks for all necessary files instead of just mod files
- Client checks if detected mod version is supported by the apworld

### **Bug Fixes:**

- Fixed kymon quest 5 being in logic without access to plains of strife
- Fixed terrnox not sending a check in ultimate difficulty
- Fixed quest for vengeance being missable
- Fixed browser launching a text client
- Fixed tyrant's hold and adjacent areas being in logic with twin falls item if FG dlc is disabled

Get the poptracker at https://github.com/routhken/Grim_Dawn_tracker/releases/
Get the mod at https://www.nexusmods.com/grimdawn/mods/167
v0.3.0.title: Grim Dawn v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
### Hotfix

- Added docstrings for compatibility with 0.6.4
- Added archipelago.json for compatibility with 0.7.0
- Fixed missing ver.txt error message
v0.3.1.title: Grim Dawn v0.3.1
